100011 00000 00001 0000000000000100 << load word what's at location 4 in reg 1.

100100 00000 00010 0000000000000001 << load byte unsigned what's at location 1 in reg 2.

000000 00001 00001 00011 00000 100100 << And R2 and R1 and save to R3

101011 00000 00010 0000000001100100  << Store R2's word in RAM[100]

100011 00000 00010 0000000001100100 << load word what's at location 100 in reg 2.

000000 00011 00010 00101 00000 100001 << Add R3 to R2 and save to R5
